QICore Adverse Event Category Codes

Code System for QICore Adverse Event Category (Preferred)

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/CodeSystem/qicore-adverseevent-category defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
blood Blood or Blood ProductBlood or Blood Product
device Device, Materials, or Information TechnologyDevice or Medical/Surgical Supply, including Health Information Technology (HIT)
fall FallFall by patient
infection Healthcare-Related InfectionHealthcare-related infection
substance Medication or Other SubstanceMedication or Other Substance
perinatal PerinatalPerinatal
ulcer Pressure UlcerPressure Ulcer
surgery Surgery or AnesthesiaSurgery or Anesthesia (includes invasive procedures)
embolism Venous ThromboembolismVenous Thromboembolism
other Other (please specify)Other (please specify)
